title: changed motherboard and cpu and having missing dll error
body:
i have my client crash right after i pick my character and it trys to load into the battlefield.
I now have a amd fx 8320 8 core with a asus M5a78L-MUSB3 mother board.   I tried to reload it ..but the launcher just dissappears and i cant reload game.
Also hoping my crashes do not get seen as leaving the game.

Just to be clear...the reinstall is failing as well

Dan

replies.body: Can you test this again in a custom match and [screenshot the DLL error](https://gyazo.com/) when it occurs?
it crashes with your error window.. i have sent about 4 crashes to your company.  I do not get a windows error
I'd like a screenshot so I can confirm which one it is. Can you grab one with the Gyazo link I provided, then link me the screenshot?

Crash Report #154108029

Thank you for reporting your crash with BugSplat! Crash reports help us to identify new issues, and fix them more effectively.
DId you reinstall windows when you changed motherboards? If not windows may be still trying to use your old hardware and that can cause alot of issues.
one of the issues was dx9 which i fixed...still crashing
